properties.name: Net2Globe Interlink
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13Net2Globle Interlink is a leading call center solutions provider in the Philippines. Net2Globe Interlink was founded in December 2004 by Anthony Batte and James Giannoit. The founders were pioneers for over fifteen years in voice and data termination utilizing internet protocol (VOIP). The network they setup serviced tier one carriers in the United States and other countries due to its superior quality and reliability. The knowledge and experience of servicing and consulting with fortune 500 companies allowed them to develop a global network of voice and data hubs which is unmatched in the call center industry. Net2Globes superior technical expertise allows it to provide a low cost high quality and reliable solution for our call centers. Established in the Philippines for over twelve years the founders have harnessed the skill sets, technology and value of both the United States and Asia. Net2Globe, Inc. is a privately held, wholly owned Philippine corporation, it’s corporate headquarters is located at. 2202 Antel Global Corporate Center, Doña Julia Vargas Avenue, Ortigas Center, Pasig City, Philippines. In anticipation for a clients needs to expand beyond our initial facilities, the technology Net2Globle Interlink have chosen has the capacity for 4,000 operating seats across multiple locations.

properties.name: NetScribe, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13NetScribe, Inc. is a call center specializing in medical transcription company in the Philippines. NetScribe, Inc. supports various medical transcription related services. NetScribe is a Transcription Outsourcing Company.

properties.name: NuComm International
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13NuComm International has grown to become the largest privately-held Canadian provider of customer relationship and contact center services With over 2,900 employees in nine contact centers and a close-knit management team that collaborates on a daily basis to execute its strategic growth plan, NuComm is a Canadian Success Story making its mark in the highly competitive global contact center industry. NuComm continues to grow at a rapid yet measured pace, servicing clients ranging from small and mid-sized businesses to Fortune 1000 multi-nationals. With a fast-growing book of business from U.S. and Canadian companies in financial services, telecommunications, cable broadcasting, automotive, order catalogue and other sectors. NuComm is forecasting an 30+% increase in revenues based on existing, signed contracts for 2004-2005 alone.

properties.name: On-line Brands Contact Center
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13On-line Brands Contact Center has already taken the time to identify and pre-qualify the service capabilities of call centers and telemarketing companies, and we can deliver the right one for your program... usually on a "same-day" basis. On-line Brands Contact Center is in the business of taking care of customers. Your customers. On-line Brands is the global leader in integrated billing and customer care services, and employee care services. With On-line Brands Contact Center\' help, your company can gain a deeper understanding of each of your customers, how to serve them better and more knowledgeably, how to process payments faster, and how to make each transaction more profitable. On-line Brands Contact Center management staff has over 30 years of experience in the placement and management of all types of telemarketing and call center programs, and we only work with best-in-class centers, ranging from family owned boutiques, with as few as 5 stations, to public companies with over 2000 stations. On-line Brands Contact Center has helped thousands of clients, large and small, to find just the right outsource service providers for their campaigns. Our clients can be found in almost every industry, and our experience provides you with access to only those centers that are most able to meet the unique requirements of your campaign.

properties.name: One Global Contact Center
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13One Global Contact Center is the fastest growing call center services provider in the Philippines. One Global Contact Center provides high-end, voice-based, outbound telemarketing services and inbound customer care solutions to corporate clients in the United States, Canada and Europe. One Global Contact Center have successfully implemented campaigns in the areas of telesales, customer care, technical support and collections for a number of clients in the telecommunications, technology, travel and B2B vertical markets. One Global Contact Center ensures exceptional client experience by combining world-class call center talent, strong management focus and best-of-breed call center technology.

properties.name: Salmat Corporation
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13Salmat is the leader in customer communications in Australasia. Most of the investment in marketing communications is in message delivery. How to seek out and identify a customer, how to reach them, how they can reach you, how to make all the links and connections required for communication to take place. That’s where Salmat can help. We link you and your customers. Salmat operates through two business divisions – Business Process Outsourcing and Customer Contact Solutions. Salmat’s philosophy of continuous improvement is evident in its approach to business partnerships. Salmat has forged relationships with other industry leaders to enhance its services, ensuring world’s best practice in every market in which it operates. Salmat offers call centre solutions through ClientLogic Philippines, a joint venture with ClientLogic, a leading international business process customer in the call centre and fulfilment industry. Located in Manila, ClientLogic Philippines provides a comprehensive range of call centre services for businesses operating anywhere in the world.

properties.name: Seven Seven Global Resources Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13Seven Seven Global Resources, one of the premier Call Center Services Provider here in the Philippines has partnered with the leading companies in the arena of international customer service. A subsidiary of Seven Seven Softwares based in Rockaway New Jersey, Seven Seven Global Resources specializes in providing and developing first-rate manpower resources for the Call Center industry in the Philippines. Manned by a team of specialists from U.S. Call Centers and backed-up by several years of experience in the realms of Human Resources, Operations and Training, it is now opening opportunities for individuals who wants to build an unyielding career in the hottest and most- ventured line of business in the country today. In response to the emerging demand for operational excellence and efficiency, Seven Seven Global Resources Inc. has taken the challenge of providing customers with alternatives that ensure high quality and productivity at minimal cost. Seven Seven Global Resources Inc. state-of-the-art facilities can provide you with a complete service from start-up operations to implementation of all Business Process Operations and Call Center Services. Seven Seven Global Resources Inc. current methodology employs the use of a proven framework that allows us to understand your key processes and recommend potential areas where outsourcing is likely to increase your core business focus. Outsourcing a unit of your operations is guaranteed to provide you with significantly reduced costs, maximized employee productivity and increased focus on what you do best: your core business.

properties.name: Sterling Global Call Center
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13Sterling Global Call Center was established in 2003 as an international telemarketing and customer service organization capable of serving the global business community from its Manila, Philippines base. Sterling Global Call Center has complete inbound, outbound and blended call center capabilities. It uses predictive dialers, digital recording and customer management software to manage campaigns. Sterling Global currently has seating capacity over three shifts daily for 250 personnel and operates in support of clients located in the United States, Europe and the Philippines. Projects range from inbound customer service and the third party verification to outbound appointment setting and sales. Combining financial stability, state-of-the-art technology and call center management expertise allows us to deliver result on time.

properties.name: Unique Interaction
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13Unique Interaction , a call center in Ortigas was established six\'s months ago. Being a small company and having a low overhead gives Unique Interaction the ability to be one of the most competitive and flexible Call Centers in Ortigas. Unique Interaction\'s pledge to quality service is strengthened by following all the rules of ISO, a rigorous hiring and training program, and complimented by state of the art technology for seamless integration of your standard procedures and our implementation process. Unique Interaction strongly adheres to an error free philosophy by eliminating the guesswork and doing things right the first time, all the time. There are a lot of Call Centers in Ortigas, most of which are large US corporations using the top of the line technology. Unique Interaction was able to put a research and development team together which has opened up the world of open source and saved hundreds of thousands of dollars over the last year. This has made us very competitive in this market because we use all the same equipment as all the large call center in Ortigas but with out their name.

properties.name: Alorica Philippines Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13 Alorica Philippines Inc. Alorica Philippines Inc. (Vertex Solutions) is a leading customer service management provider that supports the entire customer lifecycle, from front-office customer interaction to back-office reverse logistics. Alorica Philippines Inc. delivers fully integrated solutions such as customer interaction management, service logistics, depot and onsite repair services, in-home integration, as well as total eBusiness solutions. Through our global contact centers, depot repair and parts fulfillment facilities, Alorica Philippines Inc. can provide the best-in-class service management, technology, people and process to help you maximize your profits. Alorica Philippines Inc. is the premiere after-sales service provider. With a full range of solutions including call center services, service logistics, warranty and repair, returns management, field service and parts management, Alorica Philippines Inc. has the ability to support the entire customer service lifecycle. Headquartered in Chino, CA, Alorica has a growing global infrastructure with contact center and fulfillment facilities throughout the world. Alorica Philippines Inc. contact center services offer an end-to-end solution for the entire customer service and support lifecycle. Contact center associates hold service certifications and are professionally trained in Customer Service, Lead Generation and Conversion, and Product and Service Sales. Our customer contact skills are demonstrated by our low abandonment rates, short cycle times, quick response times, high closing rates, increased sales volume and more. Alorica\'s Web-based Management Technology, Helix by Alorica®, captures and saves historical data on all customer interactions and enables clients to access call tracking, reporting and performance information in real-time. URL: http://www.alorica.com/

properties.name: ICT Group
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13ICT GROUP: The CRM Solutions Company ICT GROUP is a leading globally integrated supplier of customer relationship management (CRM) solutions. We provide a comprehensive suite of sales, service and marketing solutions designed to help clients identify, acquire, retain, service, measure and maximize the lifetime value of their customer relationships. More than 14,000 ICT GROUP employees at over 40 contact centers in the United States, Canada, Europe, Australia, Mexico, the Caribbean and the Philippines support domestic and multinational corporations and institutions, primarily in the financial services, insurance, telecommunications, healthcare, information technology, media, energy and hospitality industries. ICT\'s diversified suite of CRM solutions, combined with our value-added focus and flexible near-shore and offshore operations, provides clients with optimal scalability and choice. URL: http://www.ictgroup.com/

properties.name: Influent Philippines Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13Influent Philippines, Inc. provides outsourced customer contact solutions that maximize the value of reduce the cost of each inbound and outbound customer interaction. Influent Philippines, Inc. multilingual, 250 seats network is built on a foundation of both domestic and offshore facilities in order to provide clients with a range of alternatives. Influent Philippines, Inc. have served financial, insurance, publishing, telecommunications, utilities and business services clients for over a decade. Influent Philippines, Inc. is an established provider of outsourced customer interaction solutions. Influent Philippines, Inc. mission is to connect organizations and their customers in more innovative, reliable, and profitable ways than any other service provider. Influent Philippines, Inc. vision of outsourced customer interactions is to provide strategic thinking to solving challenges in a way that cannot be matched by either in-house or alternative providers. Influent Philippines, Inc. continuously strive for a world where the outcome of every interaction is a positive experience as defined by the customer. Influent’s success can be linked to one thing — our employees. Influent Philippines, Inc. is a company of very special people who think at a senior level and are driven to win. Influent Philippines, Inc. offers the services that you’d expect: flexible solutions based on proven processes delivered by scalable technology platforms. But more importantly, Influent Philippines, Inc. talk to you in the language you know best: The language of your business. URL: http://www.influentinc.com

properties.name: Infotouch Systems, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Trdt13Infotouch Systems, Inc., is a leading provider of voice-over Internet protocol (VoIP) products and wireless network systems integration solutions. The company is a Philippine corporation with the primary business objective of providing solutions to enterprises and consumers via products of the internet. It is also a registered VAS of the National Telecommunication Commission. Since its incorporation, Infotouch Systems, Inc. has installed VoIP solutions for both corporate and enduser applications. It has established over 200 Telebabad Calling Centers throughout Metro Manila, the most extensive network of VoIP calling offices, making use of the prepaid Telebabad series of calling cards. Infotouch Systems, Inc. is majority owned by WORDTEXT SYSTEMS, INC. (WSI), the leading computer and software distributor in the country. WSI exclusively distributes such well known brands as Adobe Network Publishing and Design Solutions, Autodesk CAD Solutions, HP Projectors and High End Color LaserJets, Allied Telesyn Ethernet and IP Networking Products, Business Objects Crystal Reports/Analysis Software, Computer Associates Enterprise Backup Products, Lucent Networking Solution and Firewall, Macromedia Web Development and Authoring Tools, and Symantec Security Solutions to name a few.
